title: layers.core.Dense doesn't make use of argument activity_regularizer
body_html: As it says on the tin, the Dense class of tensorflow.python.layers.core accepts an activity_regularizer argument, but never makes use of this argument. Not sure if this is intentional or an oversight, so pointing it out.
body_text: As it says on the tin, the Dense class of tensorflow.python.layers.core accepts an activity_regularizer argument, but never makes use of this argument. Not sure if this is intentional or an oversight, so pointing it out.
body: As it says on the tin, the ``Dense`` class of ``tensorflow.python.layers.core`` accepts an ``activity_regularizer`` argument, but never makes use of this argument. Not sure if this is intentional or an oversight, so pointing it out.
